name: Shivani!
greetingText: I've something to say to you!
wishText: have a veryyy speciall dayy and remember that you are perfect!
text2: yeh sab likhta hu na main
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and bless my day too with your wish! <3 now ba-byeee pani pehte rehna and i am there for you!
replayText: Or press here, if you want to watch it again.
